Version 2.0.21 - Multiple Intercepts with Time Window

Improvements

  • Multiple intercept system: up to 5 reads within 3-second window
  • Storyline calls LMSGetValue multiple times; single intercept was insufficient
  • Simplified: only modify "l" field (other fields caused inconsistencies)
  • Removed direct API fallback (was causing conflicts)

Technical Details

  • MAX_INTERCEPTS = 5, INTERCEPT_WINDOW_MS = 3000
  • Only "l" field modified in suspend_data (position field)
  • LMSGetValue interception is now the sole navigation mechanism
  • Added version tracking in sessionStorage navData (v3)

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.20: Disabled write interception to preserve progress
  • v2.0.19: Prevent navigation reload loops
  • v2.0.18: Enhanced resume field modification + fallback
  • v2.0.16: URL-based slide navigation (?slide=X) for embed
